::Hakibuscon::

	Hakibuscon was taking a peaceful walk through the wilderness when he
spotted Dinobot, doing what appeared to be tree swinging, with Tavatron on
his back.

	"I haven't had some fun for a long, long time!  I'm going after them! 
Maybe I can find out more about this war that's going on!" Hakibuscon said
to himself, grinning.

	"Vehicle mode!!"

	Now in vehicle mode, Hakibuscon went in pursuit of Tavatron and Dinobot. 
He wasn't actually behind them though, or else he would be easily spotted
by any other bots.  He stayed a bit far off to the side where he could
cloak much easier.  Hakibuscon stopped for a moment, and realized that they
might be able to here his engine roaring.

	"Hakibuscon, transform!"

	Hakibuscon ran up behind Dinobot and Tavatron where he then pulled out his
missile gun.

	"You're toast!!!!!!!!!" He said as he shot two missiles that only had a
slim chance of hitting them.
